title: Aurimas Kučys
text:
Aurimas Kučys (born 22 February 1981) is a <a href="Lithuania">Lithuania</a>n former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>.
International career.
Kučys has represented <a href="Lithuania%20national%20football%20team">Lithuania</a> at under-21 level. He has also made 17 appearances for the senior <a href="Lithuania%20national%20football%20team">Lithuania national football team</a>.
Personal life.
His son <a href="Armandas%20Ku%C4%8Dys">Armandas Kučys</a> is also a football player.
Honours.
Ekranas Panevezys
National Team
